display_long_description:
Ghost Shooter is an immersive XR Mixed Reality horror shooter that blends your real environment with intense ghost combat.

Your room transforms into a haunted battlefield as ghosts begin to appear and move toward you. Armed with two laser guns, you must shoot them down before they get too close. Every hit you take reduces your health — and once it reaches zero, the game is over.

A continuous survival timer tracks how long you can stay alive, turning every session into a challenge to beat your own record. Fast reactions, accuracy, and awareness are the key to survival.

🔥 Features

Mixed Reality gameplay using your real surroundings

Dual laser guns for intense shooting action

Horror atmosphere with approaching ghosts

Health-based survival system

Always-running timer to track survival time

Simple, fast, and immersive gameplay

How long can you survive in the haunted world of Ghost Shooter?
